channel.title: Static on Gabriel Marin
channel.description: Recent content in Static on Gabriel Marin

item.title: First post
item.author: maringabrielmihai@gmail.com (Gabriel Marin)
item.description: Hugo is a great minimalistic tool for generating static websites. It took me one day to get a hang of it and be able to generate and publish my own website. Also the fact that there are a lot of themes at your fingertips is great, because you can also switch your aspect of your site without much effort.
